effect.scarlet_violet: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.
effect.the_teal_mask: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.
effect.the_indigo_disk: For the duration of the turn, if the target is also a valid target for a move used by one of its opponents, that move will target it instead.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Forces the target’s opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Forces the target’s opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
short_effect.the_indigo_disk: Forces the target’s opponents to aim at the target for the rest of the turn.
